content:
That's great to hear! Kryptonite is a well-known and reputable brand in the bike lock industry, and their U-locks are popular among cyclists for their security and durability.

$80 is a great price for a Kryptonite U-lock, considering the quality and security it provides. Kryptonite's U-locks are known for their thick, hardened steel shackles and discs that make them resistant to cutting and prying.

It's also good to hear that it's been serving you well so far. A good bike lock can give you peace of mind when you're locking up your bike in public, and it's always great to hear that a product is living up to its promises.

If you don't mind me asking, which specific model of Kryptonite U-lock do you have? Is it one of their more popular models, like the KryptoLok or the New York Fahgettaboudit?

Also, have you had any close calls or attempted thefts with your bike while using the lock? I'm always curious to hear about real-world experiences with bike locks!
